articles.title: Vitamin B12 deficiency: Signs of 'neurologic damage' caused by low vitamin B12 in the body - Times of India
articles.description: Vitamin B12 is one of the most essential nutrients that your body requires. It is a water-soluble vitamin that is present in many foods and is also available in the form of supplements.
